dct_title_s: Carta della Terra Santa indicante il viaggio degli Ebrei nel deserto
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Miriametri", "Rous o stadi Ebraici", and "Stadi olimpici".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
